def transform(sequence):
    sequence = sequence.replace('4', '6')
    sequence = sequence[::-1]
    sequence = sequence.replace('0', '7', 2)
    sequence = sequence.replace('0', '5', 1)
    return sequence[::-1]

the original sequence "0040044404400444" is transformed into "0050066607700666", the original sequence "0004440404400440" is transformed into "0006660507700770", the original sequence "0040444044004400" is transformed into "0050666077007700"

def transform(sequence):
    sequence = sequence.replace('4', '6')
    sequence = sequence[::-1]
    sequence = sequence.replace('0', '7', 2)
    sequence = sequence.replace('0', '5', 1)
    return sequence[::-1]
